Last.fm display the music

Personal data visualization project

This graph represents the relationship between the number of tracks published, the average duration of all the published songs and the number of listeners of a selection of musical artists.
Each artist is represented with a single circle whose position in the X and Y axes determines the relationship between average duration and number of tracks.
The surface of the circle is linked to the number of total listeners while the color indicates the main musical genre related to the artist.
The legend allows to view only the artists of a musical genre and pointing to any circle will be shown the information of each artist (name and total listeners)
All data is taken from the official API of the LAST.FM portal. The information is then processed to derive the data necessary to represent each artist
